summary: Tested BoardHeader component rollout across Unatienda admin tabs. BoardHeader is working correctly in PrivateCatalogTab (Inventory), StockOrdersTab (Stock Mov.), and StudentsTab (Students + Requests). NOTE: InventoryTab.jsx has BoardHeader implemented but is NOT rendered - UnatiendaModule uses PrivateCatalogTab for the 'inventory' tab. PublicCatalogTab does NOT use BoardHeader.

integration_issues.issue: InventoryTab.jsx has BoardHeader implemented but is NOT used. UnatiendaModule.jsx renders PrivateCatalogTab for the 'inventory' tab instead.
integration_issues.recommendation: Either integrate InventoryTab.jsx into the module navigation or remove/rename the unused file

passed_tests: Admin login at /admin/login with admin@chipi.co / admin
Navigation to Unatienda via sidebar
PrivateCatalogTab (Inventory tab): BoardHeader renders with title 'Inventory'
PrivateCatalogTab: board-tabs (All, Textbooks, Public, Archive) working
PrivateCatalogTab: board-search, board-stats, board-refresh working
PrivateCatalogTab: View mode toggles (Products/Movements) working
StockOrdersTab (Stock Mov. tab): BoardHeader renders with title 'Stock Movements'
StockOrdersTab: board-tabs (All, Textbooks, Public) for catalog filtering working
StockOrdersTab: board-search, so-type-filter dropdown working
StockOrdersTab: Stats chips (12 total, 7 pending, 5 completed, 8 ship, 0 ret, 4 adj)
StockOrdersTab: Action buttons (new-shipment-btn, new-return-btn, new-adjustment-btn) in header
StockOrdersTab: Pending actions banner visible when pending orders exist
StockOrdersTab: Tab filtering (clicking Textbooks filters orders list)
StudentsTab (Students tab): BoardHeader renders with title 'Estudiantes'
StudentsTab: board-tabs (Students/Requests toggle = Estudiantes/Solicitudes)
StudentsTab: board-search working
StudentsTab: Stats chips (28 students, 9 locked, 2 pre-sale, 9 grades)
StudentsTab: View mode toggles (Cards/Table) working
StudentsTab: pending-requests-badge visible showing pending count
StudentsTab: Table view renders correctly on toggle
StudentsTab Requests section: Separate BoardHeader with 'Solicitudes' title
StudentsTab Requests: req-status-filter and req-school-filter dropdowns working
BoardHeader component has correct mobile responsiveness (md:hidden classes)
action_items: CRITICAL: InventoryTab.jsx has BoardHeader implemented (title: 'Stock Dashboard', Package icon, view modes, stats) BUT it is NOT rendered. UnatiendaModule.jsx line 153 renders PrivateCatalogTab for 'inventory' tab instead. Either: (1) Replace PrivateCatalogTab with InventoryTab in module, (2) Keep current behavior and remove/rename unused InventoryTab.jsx, or (3) Add InventoryTab as a separate navigation option
PublicCatalogTab does NOT use BoardHeader component - uses its own 'Public Catalog' card header design. If consistency is required, BoardHeader should be added to PublicCatalogTab.jsx
critical_code_review_comments: BoardHeader.jsx is well-implemented with proper mobile responsiveness (md:hidden filter toggle, mobile filters panel)
All data-testid attributes are correctly applied across all tabs
StockOrdersTab correctly implements tabs, filters, stats, and action buttons in BoardHeader
StudentsTab correctly implements dual BoardHeaders for Students and Requests sections
InventoryTab.jsx exists but is orphaned - not used in UnatiendaModule navigation
Line 153 in UnatiendaModule.jsx: 'inventory' tab renders PrivateCatalogTab, not InventoryTab

success_rate.frontend: 95% - All rendered components work correctly, InventoryTab.jsx is orphaned/unused

context_for_next_testing_agent: BoardHeader is successfully used in PrivateCatalogTab (Inventory), StockOrdersTab (Stock Mov.), and StudentsTab (Students + Requests). IMPORTANT: InventoryTab.jsx exists with BoardHeader implementation but is NOT rendered - UnatiendaModule renders PrivateCatalogTab instead. Mobile nav sidebar navigation has visibility/z-index issues on 375px viewport but desktop (1920px) works perfectly.
